trans-unit.source: Represents a length measurement.
trans-unit.target: 表示的长度度量。

trans-unit.source: The Unit structure represents a length measurement that can be expressed in any HTML-compatible size unit.
trans-unit.target: 单元结构表示可以用任何 HTML 兼容的大小单位表示的长度度量。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType> enumeration lists the units of measurement that can be represented.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType>枚举列出可以表示的度量单位。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType>

trans-unit.source: The Unit is used by properties such as `BorderWidth` and `Height` to represent the length or width of the property.
trans-unit.target: 此单元如使用由属性`BorderWidth`和`Height`来表示的长度或宽度的属性。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderWidth%2A> property of a Web Server control to a Unit that represents five pixels.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderWidth%2A>表示&5; 个像素单元到 Web 服务器控件的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Unit class can represent values only between -32768 and 32767.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 单元类可以表示仅在-32768 到 32767 之间的值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Value%2A> property to determine the length of the measurement.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Value%2A>属性来确定度量值的长度。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The unit of measurement is determined using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Type%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用确定的度量单位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Type%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Type%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can convert other data types to a Unit by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Parse%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Percentage%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Pixel%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Point%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过使用其他数据类型转换为一个单元<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Parse%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Percentage%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Pixel%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Point%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Point%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Pixel%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Percentage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Parse%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of Unit, see the Unit constructor.
trans-unit.target: 有关的单元实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅单元构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref> structure with the specified double precision floating point number.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref>用指定的双精度浮点数的结构。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> structure using the specified double precision floating point number.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>结构使用指定的双精度浮点数。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Type%2A>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Value%2A>|The value specified by `value`.| > [!CAUTION] > If `value` is not between -32768 and 32767, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: |属性 |初始值 | |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Type%2A>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Value%2A>|指定的值`value`。 | 1> [!CAUTION] 1> 如果`value`是不介于-32768 到 32767 之间，会引发异常。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Value%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Type%2A>

trans-unit.source: A double precision floating point number that represents the length of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref> in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 双精度浮点数，表示的总<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref>以像素为单位。

trans-unit.source: value is not between -32768 and 32767.
trans-unit.target: value不是介于-32768 到 32767 之间。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref> structure with the specified 32-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref>用指定的 32 位有符号整数的结构。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> structure using the specified 32-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>结构使用指定的 32 位有符号的整数。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Type%2A>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Value%2A>|The value specified by `value`.| > [!CAUTION] > If `value` is not between -32768 and 32767, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: |属性 |初始值 | |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Type%2A>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Value%2A>|指定的值`value`。 | 1> [!CAUTION] 1> 如果`value`是不介于-32768 到 32767 之间，会引发异常。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Value%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Type%2A>

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer that represents the length of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref> in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 一个 32 位有符号的整数，它表示的长度<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref>以像素为单位。

trans-unit.source: value is not between -32768 and 32767.
trans-unit.target: value不是介于-32768 到 32767 之间。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref> structure with the specified length.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref>具有指定长度的结构。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> structure using the specified length.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>结构使用指定的长度。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>

trans-unit.source: The length is specified in two parts, the length's value and the length's unit type.
trans-unit.target: 在两个部分，长度的值和长度的单位类型中指定了长度。

trans-unit.source: For example, "200Cm" represents a length of 200 centimeters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，"200 Cm"表示的长度为 200 厘米。

trans-unit.source: You can use any valid CSS-compliant unit expression.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用任何有效的 CSS 符合单元表达式。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the common unit types.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了常用的单位类型。

trans-unit.source: |Unit type|Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`Pixel`|Length in pixels.| |`Point`|Length in points.
trans-unit.target: |单位类型 |说明 | |---------------|-----------------| |`Pixel`|以像素为单位的长度。 | |`Point`|以磅为单位的长度。

trans-unit.source: A point represents 1/72 of an inch.| |`Inch`|Length in inches.| |`Mm`|Length in millimeters.| |`Cm`|Length in centimeters.| |`Percentage`|Length as a percentage of the parent element.| The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>.
trans-unit.target: 点表示英寸的 1/72。 | |`Inch`|以英寸为单位的长度。 | |`Mm`|以毫米为单位的长度。 | |`Cm`|长度以厘米。 | |`Percentage`|长度，作为父元素的百分比。 | 下表显示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Type%2A>|The unit type specified in `value`.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Value%2A>|The value specified in `value`.| > [!CAUTION] > If `value` is not between -32768 and 32767, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: |属性 |初始值 | |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Type%2A>|中指定的单位类型`value`。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Value%2A>|中指定的值`value`。 | 1> [!CAUTION] 1> 如果`value`是不介于-32768 到 32767 之间，会引发异常。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Value%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Type%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the length of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，表示的总<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified length is not between -32768 and 32767.
trans-unit.target: 指定的长度不在-32768 到 32767 之间。

trans-unit.source: value is not a valid CSS-compliant unit expression.
trans-unit.target: value不是有效的 CSS 符合单元表达式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref> structure with the specified double precision floating point number and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref>用指定的双精度浮点数的结构和<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> structure using the specified double precision floating point number and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType>.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>使用指定的双精度浮点结构点数量和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>的新实例

trans-unit.source: Represents an empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个空<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为只读的。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Compares this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref> with the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 比较此<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref>与指定的对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the Equals method to compare the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> that this method is called from with the object specified by `obj`.
trans-unit.target: Equals 方法用于比较<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>与指定的对象从调用此方法， `obj`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>

trans-unit.source: For both objects to be equal, they must have the same values for both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Type%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Value%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 对于两个相等的对象，它们必须具有相同的值，两个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Type%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Value%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Value%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Type%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The object specified by `obj` must by a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> type object for the comparison to succeed.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 指定的对象`obj`必须通过<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>为了成功进行比较的类型对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>

trans-unit.source: If the object is `null`, `false` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果对象是`null`，`false`返回。

trans-unit.source: The object for comparison.
trans-unit.target: 用于比较的对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref> that this method is called from is equal to the specified object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"> </xref> ，从调用此方法是等于指定的对象; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回此实例的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer that is the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 一个 32 位有符号的整数，是此实例的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref> is empty.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref>为空。

trans-unit.source: Use the IsEmpty property to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> is empty.
trans-unit.target: IsEmpty 属性用于确定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>为空。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> is empty if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Type%2A> property contains an enumeration value of 0.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>为空如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Type%2A>属性包含的枚举值为 0。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Type%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>

trans-unit.target: 使用此运算符比较两个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>对象是否相等。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Compares two <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref> objects to determine whether they are not equal.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref>对象以确定它们是否不相等。

trans-unit.source: Use this operator to compare two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> objects for inequality.
trans-unit.target: 使用此运算符比较两个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>对象是否不相等。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>

trans-unit.source: For the objects to not be equal, they must have different values for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Type%2A> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 对于不相等的对象，它们必须具有不同的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Type%2A>属性或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Value%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Value%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Type%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref> on the left side of the operator.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"> </xref>运算符左侧。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref> on the right side of the operator.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"> </xref>运算符右侧。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref> objects are not equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref>对象是否不相等; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 转换到指定的字符串<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use the Parse static method to convert the string specified by the `s` parameter to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>.
trans-unit.target: 使用分析的静态方法将指定的字符串转换`s`到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>参数

trans-unit.source: The string to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref> that represents the specified string.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"> </xref> ，它表示指定的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string and <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName> to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Parse%2A> static method to convert the string specified by `s` to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> in the culture specified by `culture`.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Parse%2A>静态方法，用于将转换指定的字符串`s`到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>中由指定的区域性`culture`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Parse%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The unit of measurement when using this method is <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType>.

trans-unit.source: The string to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的字符串。

trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName>表示的区域性的对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref> that represents the specified string.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref> of type <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType"></xref> from the specified double-precision floating-point number.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref>类型的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType"></xref>从指定的双精度浮点数。

trans-unit.source: Use the Percentage static method to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> of type <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType> that represents the length specified by the `n` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 百分比静态方法用于创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>类型的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType>，它表示指定的长度`n`参数。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify 80 for *n* and use the returned unit to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Height%2A> of a Web server control, the `height` attribute is set to 80%.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果指定 80 作为*n*并使用返回的单元来设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Height%2A>的 Web 服务器控件，`height`属性设置为 80%。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> class can represent values only between -32768 and 32767.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>类可以表示仅在-32768 到 32767 之间的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>

trans-unit.source: A double-precision floating-point number that represents the length of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 双精度浮点数，它表示的长度<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref> of type <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType"></xref> that represents the length specified by the double-precision floating-point number.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"> </xref>类型的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType"> </xref> ，它表示指定的双精度浮点数的长度。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.IsEmpty%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType> enumeration value is returned.
